text: @realDonaldTrump @RoyCooperNC @DanForestNC Lol, you don’t give a damn about your idiot supporters. They could all die tomorrow from Covid-19 and you’ll blame them for breathing all over everybody without a mask you encouraged at one of your Klan rallies.
